alert.note: Alert for Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 15 at 11:22PM CST until February 16 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN PITTSBURG COUNTY... At 1122 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles east of Alderson to 7 miles southwest of Hartshorne to 4 miles north of Daisy, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Mcalester... Hartshorne... Alderson... Blanco... Haileyville... Pittsburg... Dow... Bache... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tulsa.
